name: Keen The Slater ll Insulated Waterproof Boots - Men's
categories: The Slater ll Insulated Waterproof Boots
description:
Classic work boot lines that look at home in the shop or at the pub. Constructed from waterproof leather from Leather Working Group-certified tanneries, the Slater II boots look forward while being inspired by the past.Leather comes from a Leather Working Group-certified tannery, The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Insulated with KEEN.Warm insulation for cold winter’s days.Supportive EVA midsole offers lightweight comfort.Insoles are infused with a probiotic anti-odour treatment.Non-marking rubber outsole.PFC-free water-repellant finish keeps you dry and your boots looking cleaner longer.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
